sentences.en: 70% of our globe's surface is water.
sentences.cn: 地球表面70%的地方覆盖着水。

sentences.en: Chess fans around the globe watched the match with breathless interest.
sentences.cn: 全世界的棋迷都屏息静观这场棋赛.

sentences.en: Curious tourists and reporters from around the globe are descending upon the peaceful villages.
sentences.cn: 好奇的游客和记者从世界各地一齐涌向这些平静的村落。

sentences.en: For this year at least, our race to circumnavigate the globe in less than 80 days is over.
sentences.cn: 至少今年，我们80天内环游地球一周的比赛已经结束了。

sentences.en: GLOBE AIRLINES FLIGHT 621 TO ISTANBUL IS DEPARTING.
sentences.cn: 环球航空公司飞往伊斯坦布尔的第621次客机就要出发了.

sentences.en: He still wheels and deals around the globe.
sentences.cn: 他仍然在世界各地招摇撞骗。

sentences.en: Martin, 78, died yesterday. Tributes poured in from around the globe.
sentences.cn: 马丁于昨天去世，享年78岁。世界各地的人们纷纷致以哀悼。

sentences.en: The earth is a terraqueous globe.
sentences.cn: 地球是水与陆地合成的球体.

sentences.en: The globe is rolling round all the time.
The overhead light was covered now with a white globe.
sentences.cn: 顶灯现在被一个白色的球状物罩了起来。

sentences.en: The silvery globe of the moon hung in the sky.
sentences.cn: 银盘似的月亮悬挂在空中.

sentences.en: There is plenty of water on the face of the globe.
Three large globes stand on the floor.
sentences.cn: 3个巨大的地球仪立在地板上。

sentences.en: tourists from every corner of the globe
TV globe-trotter Alan Whicker was nearly burned alive by an angry mob in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 满世界跑新闻的电视记者艾伦·威克在埃及差点儿被一群愤怒的暴徒活活烧死。

sentences.en: We export our goods all over the globe.
sentences.cn: 我们的商品出口到世界各地。

sentences.en: We use a globe in our geography class.
sentences.cn: 我们在地理课上使用地球仪.
